title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 542 - Industrial Development Agency Or Authority Agent/project Operator Obligations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 542 - Industrial Development Agency Or Authority Agent/project Operator Obligations

State Regulations
§ 542.1 - Annual report for agents and project operators of industrial development agencies or authorities

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 542

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 1142 and 1250; General

Municipal Law, § 874[8]; Public Authorities Law, §§ 1964-a[9] and 2327
[9]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
